item.description:
Hey Live Music Lovers,

The Lansdowne Pub has a fun new twist on Karaoke - a live backing band!

No more crappy sound system and cheezy fake music behind you.

Get up on stage and belt with the band. Or, just listen to live music performed by your fellow meetup pals!

The backing band is the "Jukebox Heroes". They play top 40 songs plus music from the '80s, '90s, and '00s.

This is a joint meetup with "Fun with Alcohol", so we've reserved a table for about 25 people near the stage.

One more plus, The Lansdowne Pub is providing free appetizers for the first hour!

Let's get together at 8:30PM. That way we'll have time for a few drinks before 9 PM when the Karaoke starts. Nobody should attempt karaoke without having a few drinks first :-)

Come on out and channel your inner rock star!

I hope to see you there!

Your Friendly assistant organizer,

Patrick
item.how_to_find_us: We will be at the "L" shaped table to the left of the stage. I'm the guy with the ponytail who looks suspiciously like my picture :-)
item.name: Live Band Karaoke at The Lansdowne Pub!
